column4: Hi guys. I'm having issues booting 10.04.3 from USB key. It tells me "Unknown keyword in configuration file: gfxboot"
I've booted it from USB key.
I have also tried re-burning the iso onto the USB, still same issue.
I also can't find other 10.04 version than 10.04.3
Any hints how can I boot the 10.04.3 installer?
try unetbootin
Try using unetbootin
I'll try that (does it run on Ubuntu?)
yes
Sidewinder1 Blade20 Thanks guys, I'll give unetbootin a try
alternate cd does not work on usb
ouch :/
It will tell you please insert disk (stupid I know)
How do you know? I thought iso is just an iso :<
You're welcome
Glad it worked out karni!
but I'm not a guy!
No! Can't be! Seriously ;)! <3
'guys' term is a unisex thing :)
You really think he meant that? #ubuntuone is much more heavy than this channel at this time of day :) I don't think it's a problem.
But I'm happy to hear about ubuntu-offtopic
